column1: text

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Brazil and Peru have lodged objections to a bid made by the US e-commerce giant for a prime new piece of cyberspace 
 to: Brazil and Peru have made objections to a bid made by the huge US e-commerce company for a prime new piece of cyberspace

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Until now, the differences between commercial, governmental and other types of identity were easily distinguished in every internet address by .com, .gov and 20 other categories.
 
 to: Until now, the differences between commercial, governmental and other types of identity were easy to see in every internet address by the use of .com, .gov and 20 other categories.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: But these categories  or generic top-level domains (gTLDs) as they are technically known  are about to undergo the biggest expansion since the start of the worldwide web.
 
 to: But these categories  or generic top-level domains (gTLDs) as they are technically known  are about to see the biggest expansion since the start of the worldwide web.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Amazon has applied for dozens of new domains, including .shop, .song, .book and .kindle.
 
 to: Amazon has applied for many new domains, including .shop, .song, .book and .kindle.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Allowing private companies to register geographical names as gTLDs to reinforce their brand strategy or to profit from the meaning of these names does not serve, in our view, the public interest, the Brazilian Ministry of Science and Technology said.
 
 to: Allowing private companies to register geographical names as gTLDs to strengthen their brand or to profit from the meaning of these names is not, in our view, in the public interest, the Brazilian Ministry of Science and Technology said.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Brazil said its views were endorsed last month by other members of the Amazon Cooperation Treaty (Bolivia, Colombia, Ecuador, Guyana, Suriname and Venezuela).
 
 to: Brazil said its views were supported by other members of the Amazon Cooperation Treaty (Bolivia, Colombia, Ecuador, Guyana, Suriname and Venezuela).

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Argentina has lodged an expression of its unhappiness that the US outdoor clothing retailer, Patagonia, is claiming a domain name that has been known far longer as a region of spectacular beauty that also has its own parliament.
 
 to: Argentina is unhappy that the US outdoor clothing retailer, Patagonia, is claiming a domain name that has been known far longer as a region of spectacular beauty that also has its own parliament.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Argentina rejects the .patagonia request for a new generic top-level domain, the government notes in an appeal.
 
 to: Argentina rejects the .patagonia request for a new generic top-level domain.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Patagonia is a relevant region for the countrys economy because it has oil, fishing, mining and agriculture resources.
 
 to: Patagonia is an important region for the countrys economy because it has oil, fishing, mining and agriculture resources.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The first approved domain names should be in use before the end of 2013. 
 
 to: The first approved domain names will probably be in use before the end of 2013.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: But the Dutch capital may lose its reputation for tolerance over plans to dispatch nuisance neighbours to scum villages made from shipping containers.
 
 to: But the Dutch capitals plans to send nuisance neighbours to scum villages made from shipping containers may damage its reputation for tolerance.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The Mayor, Eberhard van der Laan, insists his controversial new 810,000 policy to tackle antisocial behaviour is to protect victims of abuse and homophobia from harassment.
 
 to: The Mayor, Eberhard van der Laan, says his controversial new 810,000 policy to deal with antisocial behaviour is to protect victims of abuse and homophobia.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The camps where antisocial tenants will be rehoused for three to six months have been called scum villages because the policy echoes proposals from Geert Wilders, the far-right populist, who last year demanded that repeat offenders be sent to a village for scum.
 
 to: The camps, where antisocial families will be rehoused for three to six months, have been called scum villages because the policy is similar to proposals from Geert Wilders, the far-right politician, who last year said that repeat offenders should be sent to a village for scum.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: But Bartho Boer, a spokesman for the Mayor, denies that the plans are illiberal.
 
 to: Bartho Boer, a spokesman for the Mayor, says that the plans are not illiberal.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: We want everyone to be who he and she is  whether they are gay and lesbian or stand up to violence and are then victims of harassment.
 
 to: We want everyone to be who he and she is  whether they are gay and lesbian or resist violence and are then victims of harassment.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: According to Boer, the villages are not for the regular nuisance between two neighbours where one has the stereo too loud on Saturday night but people who are extremely violent and intimidating, and in a clear situation where a victim is being repeatedly harassed.
 
 to: According to Boer, the villages are not for a problem neighbour who has the stereo too loud on Saturday night but people who are extremely violent and intimidating and in a clear situation where a victim is being harassed again and again.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Those deemed guilty of causing extreme havoc will be evicted and placed in temporary homes of a basic nature, including converted shipping containers in industrial areas of the city.
 
 to: People found guilty of causing extreme havoc will be evicted and put in basic temporary homes, including converted shipping containers in industrial areas of the city.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Dutch newspaper the Parool has pointed out that in the 19th century troublemakers were moved to villages in Drenthe and Overijssel, which rapidly became slums.
 
 to: Dutch newspaper the Parool has written that in the 19th century troublemakers were moved to villages in Drenthe and Overijssel, which rapidly became slums.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: But Boer insists that the administration has learned from past mistakes and is not planning to house the antisocial together.
 
 to: But Boer insists that the government has learned from past mistakes and is not planning to house antisocial families together.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The city government anticipates moving around ten families a year into this programme, which starts in 2013.
 
 to: The city government expects to move around ten families a year into this programme, which starts in 2013.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The temporary dwellings will be heavily policed, but antisocial tenants will also have access to doctors, social workers and parole officers.
 
 to: The temporary accommodation will be heavily policed, but antisocial families will also have access to doctors, social workers and parole officers.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Brazils latest funk sensation, Anitta, has won millions of fans by taking the favela sound into the mainstream, but she is at the centre of a debate about skin colour.
 
 to: Brazils latest funk sensation, Anitta, has won millions of fans by making the favela sound popular, but she is at the centre of a debate about skin colour.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Anti-discrimination campaigners and social commentators say the music industrys fastest rising star has had to sacrifice her blackness to make it into the predominantly white middleclass market.
 
 to: Anti-discrimination campaigners and social commentators say the music industrys fastest rising star has had to give up her blackness to be a success in the predominantly white middle-class market.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The controversy was prompted by the publication of then-and-now photographs that show a dramatic lightening of Anittas skin tone since she signed a deal with Warner.
 
 to: The controversy began with the publication of then-and-now photographs that show a dramatic lightening of Anittas skin tone since she signed a deal with Warner.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Jarid Arraes, a psychology student and blogger, wrote a post criticizing the latent discrimination in media and marketing that she felt Anittas image change represented.
 
 to: Jarid Arraes, a psychology student and blogger, wrote a post criticizing the discrimination in media and marketing that she felt Anittas image change represented.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: She has now exploded into the public consciousness with an album and a huge hit single, Show das Poderosas, which topped the charts and attracted 52 million YouTube views.
 
 to: She now has an album and a huge hit single, Show das Poderosas, which topped the charts and attracted 52 million YouTube views.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Brazil  one of the last big countries in the world to ban slavery  has the largest population of African descent outside Africa, but race and ancestry are less important here than colour.
 
 to: Brazil  one of the last big countries in the world to ban slavery  has the largest population of African descent outside Africa, but race and where your family come from are less important there than colour.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The vast majority of business and government executives are white, while most menial jobs are done by black and mixed-race workers.
 
 to: Most business and government executives are white, while most menial jobs are done by black and mixed-race workers.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Walk through Ipanema, Gvea or other upmarket districts and you are far more likely to see black nannies pushing strollers with white toddlers than a white nanny pushing a black child.
 
 to: If you walk through Ipanema, Gvea or other rich districts, you are far more likely to see black nannies pushing strollers with white children than a white nanny pushing a black child.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Sylvio Ferreira, a psychology lecturer at the Federal University of Pernambuco, believes Anitta has won the hearts of the middle class by taking a rebellious sound and making it tamer and more palatable to everyone.
 
 to: Sylvio Ferreira, a psychology lecturer at the Federal University of Pernambuco, believes Anitta has won the hearts of the middle class by taking a rebellious sound and making it more acceptable to everyone.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Unlike more populous and accessible parts of the world, which have been mapped using a special camera mounted on a car roof, the Iqaluit project had mappers hiking the towns snow-packed roads and traversing little-known trails, some of which are made of ice and disappear in the brief summer months.
 
 to: Unlike more accessible parts of the world, which have been mapped using a special camera on a car roof, for Googles Iqaluit project mappers walked the towns snowpacked roads and crossed little-known trails, some of which are made of ice and disappear in the short summer months.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The Street View project, he said, follows in the footsteps of the English explorer Martin Frobisher, who in 1576 sailed into the bay where Iqaluit now sits while searching for the Northwest Passage, and the 1941 flight of Captain Elliott Roosevelt, a reconnaissance officer and son of the US President, which led to the site being chosen for a military airbase.
 
 to: The Street View project, he said, follows in the footsteps of the English explorer Martin Frobisher, who in 1576 sailed into the bay where Iqaluit now is while searching for the Northwest Passage, and the 1941 flight of Captain Elliott Roosevelt, an officer and son of the US President, which led to the site being chosen for a military airbase.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Another difficulty was how to situate many businesses and homeowners that have mail sent to the local post office rather than delivered to their address.
 
 to: One difficulty was how to situate many businesses and homeowners that have mail sent to the local post office, not delivered to their address.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Sayani, 32, said the town would be able to use the maps as a promotional tool for those thinking of visiting or moving to the area.
 
 to: Arif Sayani, the towns Director of Planning, said the town would be able to use the maps as a promotional tool for those thinking of visiting or moving to the area.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: It may also speed up planning decisions that will affect Iqaluits growth.
 
 to: It may also speed up planning decisions in Iqaluit.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The controversial auction of a Banksy mural that disappeared from the wall of a north London shop in mysterious circumstances was dramatically halted just moments before it was due to go under the hammer.
 
 to: The controversial auction of a Banksy mural that disappeared from the wall of a north London shop was dramatically stopped just moments before it was going to be sold.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Claire Kober, Leader of Haringey Council, wrote to Arts Council England and the Mayor of Miami, Toms Regalado, to ask them to intervene to stop the sale but it appears the decision to withdraw the item came from the gallery owners in consultation with their lawyers.
 
 to: Claire Kober, Leader of Haringey Council, wrote to Arts Council England and the Mayor of Miami, Toms Regalado, to ask them to stop the sale, but it appears the decision to remove the item from sale came from the gallery owners.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Although there are no legal issues whatsoever regarding the sale of lots six and seven by Banksy, FAAM convinced its sellers to withdraw these lots from the auction.
 
 to: Although there are no legal issues whatsoever regarding the sale of lots six and seven by Banksy, FAAM convinced its sellers to remove these lots from the auction.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Critics have accused the auction house of dealing in stolen property but Thut insisted earlier in the week that the seller, who he described as a well known collector, was the rightful owner and that the sale was legal.
 
 to: Critics have accused the auction house of buying and selling stolen property but Thut said that the seller, who he described as a well known collector, was the rightful owner and that the sale was legal.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The second Banksy due to be auctioned, a 2007 artwork entitled Wet Dog that was removed from a Bethlehem wall and is estimated to be worth up to $800,000, disappeared from the auction houses online catalogue at lunchtime on Saturday, but Slave Labour was still listed for sale right up to the 3pm start time.
 
 to: The second Banksy to be auctioned, a 2007 artwork called Wet Dog that was removed from a Bethlehem wall and is estimated to be worth up to $800,000, was removed from the auction houses online catalogue, but Slave Labour was still listed for sale right up to the 3pm start time.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The vast fortunes made by the worlds richest 100 billionaires are driving up inequality and hindering the worlds ability to tackle poverty, according to Oxfam.
 
 to: The huge fortunes made by the worlds richest 100 billionaires are increasing inequality and hindering the worlds ability to tackle poverty, according to Oxfam.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Oxfam said the worlds poorest could be lifted out of poverty several times over if the richest 100 billionaires would give away the money they made in 2012.
 
 to: Oxfam said the worlds poorest could be taken out of poverty several times over if the richest 100 billionaires would give away the money they made in 2012.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Bill Gates and Warren Buffett are among a group of 40 US billionaires who have pledged much of their wealth to aid projects, but there is little detail about the level of their annual donations.
 
 to: Bill Gates and Warren Buffett are among a group of 40 US billionaires who have said they will give much of their wealth to aid projects, but there is little detail about the level of their annual donations.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: In the report, The Cost of Inequality 
 to: In the report, The Cost of Inequality

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: She said studies show that countries suffer low levels of investment and growth as workers are forced to survive on a smaller share of total incomes.
 
 to: Barbara Stocking, Oxfams Chief Executive, said studies show that countries suffer low levels of investment and growth as workers are forced to survive on a smaller share of total incomes.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: She said 
 to: She said

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: In China, the top 10% now take home nearly 60% of the income.
 
 to: In China, the top 10% now earn nearly 60% of the income.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Chinese inequality levels are now similar to those in South Africa, which is now the most unequal country on Earth and significantly more unequal than at the end of apartheid.
 
 to: Chinese inequality levels are now similar to those in South Africa, which is now the most unequal country on Earth.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Stocking said 
 to: Stocking said

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: As a first step, world leaders should formally commit themselves to reducing inequality to the levels seen in 1990.
 
 to: As a first step, world leaders should formally agree to reduce inequality to the levels seen in 1990.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: She said closing tax havens, which the Tax Justice Network says hold as much as $31 trillion, or as much as a third of all global wealth, could yield $189bn in additional tax revenues. 
 
 to: She said closing tax havens, which hold as much as $31 trillion, or as much as a third of all global wealth, could collect $189bn in additional taxes.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Dozens of alternatives have sprung up to take its place, from Facebooks and Apples own-brand instant messaging applications to independent start-ups such as WhatsApp and Kik (which is also Canadian).
 
 to: Dozens of alternatives have sprung up to take its place, from Facebooks and Apples instant messaging applications to independent apps such as WhatsApp and Kik (which is also Canadian).

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Free to download and use, they use the internet to swap text messages, pictures, voice clips, stickers, and even videos in WhatsApps case, between most types of phones.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: In an attempt to retain its following, BBM has been released on Android and Apple phones.
 
 to: In an attempt to keep its customers, BBM has been released on Android and Apple phones.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: BBM claims 80 million monthly users after its upgrade, but WhatsApp has 300 million.
 
 to: BBM says it has 80 million monthly users after its upgrade, but WhatsApp has 300 million.

 to: Other services show BBMs limitations

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Even the contacts and calendar sharing that BBM made possible on BlackBerry handsets have not migrated to the Apple and Android versions.
 
 to: Even the contacts and calendar sharing that BBM made possible on BlackBerry phones are not on the Apple and Android versions.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Photos uploaded to Instagram trigger a wave of comments and Snapchats pictures, which self-delete after ten seconds, have opened a world of other possibilities.
 
 to: Photos uploaded to Instagram get instant comments and Snapchats pictures, which selfdelete after ten seconds, have opened a world of other possibilities.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Yet as recently as 2011, BBM was so powerful it was credited with starting a revolution in Egypt; and, at the time of the London riots, it was a more urgent source of news than the television screen.
 
 to: But as recently as 2011, BBM was so powerful it helped to start a revolution in Egypt; and at the time of the London riots, it was a more immediate source of news than the television screen.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: He manages a youth club in Stockwell, south London, an area with some of the highest levels of crime and economic deprivation in Britain.
 
 to: He manages a youth club in Stockwell, south London, an area with some of the highest levels of crime and poverty in Britain.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Nearly 80% of young smartphone owners regularly use a social networking application, says the research firm Enders Analysis, but two-thirds use more than one.

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 text: All of these apps plug into your phone book and your photo library.
 
 to: All of these apps use your smartphone  they plug into your phone book and your photo library.

 text: He keeps his BlackBerry for messaging, uses an iPhone over wi-fi to play games and makes phone calls on an HTC-branded Android phone.
 
 to: He keeps his BlackBerry for messaging, uses an iPhone to play games, and makes phone calls on an Android phone.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Once I saw my mum on Facebook, I deleted my account.
 
 to: When I saw my mum on Facebook, I deleted my account.

 text: Prosecutions after the riots put an end to that belief.
 
 to: Arrests and prosecutions after the riots put an end to that belief.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Bolivia had argued that the convention was 2 in opposition to its new constitution, adopted in 2009, which obliges it to protect native and ancestral coca as cultural patrimony and maintains that coca in its natural state  is not a narcotic.
 
 to: Bolivia had argued that the convention was in 2 opposition to its new constitution, adopted in 2009, which says it must protect native and ancestral coca as part of its cultural heritage and maintains that coca in its natural state  is not a narcotic.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The leaves reputedly provide energy and are said to have medicinal qualities.
 
 to: The leaves are said to provide energy and have medicinal qualities.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The Bolivian move is inspirational and groundbreaking, said Danny Kushlick, Head of External Affairs at the Transform Drug Policy Foundation, which promotes drug liberalization.
 
 to: The Bolivian move is inspirational and groundbreaking, said Danny Kushlick, of the Transform Drug Policy Foundation, which supports drug liberalization.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: However, the UNs International Narcotics Control 4 Board (INCB), which monitors implementation of the global drug treaties, has accused Bolivia of threatening the integrity of the international drug control regime.
 
 to: However, the UNs International Narcotics Control 4 Board (INCB), which checks implementation of global drug treaties, says that Bolivia is threatening international drug controls.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The right of indigenous communities in South 6 Americas Andean region to chew coca leaf was removed in 1964 when Bolivia was under a dictatorship and it signed up to the convention.
 
 to: The right of indigenous people in South Americas 6 Andean region to chew coca leaf was removed in 1964 when Bolivia was under a dictatorship and it signed up to the convention.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: But, under the terms of the agreement, Bolivia was given 25 years to implement the ban.
 
 to: But Bolivia was given 25 years to implement the ban.

 to: Bolivias return could be blocked only if a third or more of the 184 countries that have signed up to the convention opposed its request.

 to: Nancie Prudhomme, of the International Centre 10 on Human Rights and Drug Policy, criticized the co-ordinated opposition to Bolivias demands.

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 to: The growing of coca leaves is legal and licensed in Bolivia.

 to: There should be greater flexibility, less masculine cultures, more emphasis on outcomes rather than time in the office and greater transparency around performance and rewards.

 to: Maria Miller, the Minister for Women and Equalities, said

 to: However, the CMIs data did provide some evidence to support Millers statement that the overall pay gap is narrowing

 text: A sub-set of 17,000 individual managers, whose salaries and bonuses have been tracked over a number of years, showed that male managers earnings are rising faster than womens for the first time in five years, with men enjoying total increases of 3.2% compared with 2.8% for women, when salaries and bonuses are combined.
 
 to: A sub-set of 17,000 individual managers, whose salaries and bonuses have been followed over a number of years, showed that male managers earnings are rising faster than womens for the first time in five years.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Brazil experienced one of its biggest nights of protest in decades as more than 100,000 people took to the streets nationwide to express their frustration at heavy-handed policing, poor public services and high costs for the World Cup.
 
 to: Brazil experienced one of its biggest nights of protest in decades as more than 100,000 people took to the streets to express their frustration at aggressive policing, poor public services and high costs for the World Cup.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The unrest escalated during the night as a large crowd set several fires outside the legislative assembly, smashed the buildings windows and painted graffiti on the walls proclaiming Revolution, Down with Paes, down with Cabral [the mayor and state governor] and Hate police.
 
 to: The unrest increased during the night as a large crowd set several fires outside a government office, smashed the buildings windows and painted graffiti on the walls that said Revolution, Down with Paes, down with Cabral [the mayor and state governor] and Hate police.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: There must be something wrong with this country, said Nadia al Husin, holding up a banner calling on the government to do more for education.
 
 to: There must be something wrong with this country, said Nadia al Husin.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: In Belo Horizonte, police clashed with protesters who tried to break through a cordon around a football stadium hosting a Confederations Cup match between Nigeria and Tahiti.
 
 to: In Belo Horizonte, police clashed with protesters who tried to get into a football stadium, which was hosting a Confederations Cup match between Nigeria and Tahiti.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: In Porto Alegre, demonstrators set fire to a bus and, in Curitiba, protesters attempted to force their way into the office of the state governor.
 
 to: In Porto Alegre, demonstrators set fire to a bus and, in Curitiba, protesters tried to force their way into the office of the state governor.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Another global link was evident in the handful of demonstrators who wore Guy Fawkes masks, associated with Anonymous and the Occupy Wall Street protests.
 
 to: You could see another global link in the demonstrators who wore Guy Fawkes masks, associated with Anonymous and the Occupy Wall Street protests.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Brazils demonstrations are being referred to as the vinegar revolution (after police arrested people for carrying vinegar to counter tear gas), as well as the 20-cent revolution (due to the bus price rise) and the Passe Livre (after the demand for free public transport).
 
 to: Brazils demonstrations are being referred to as the vinegar revolution (after police arrested people for carrying vinegar to fight the effects of tear gas), as well as the 20-cent revolution (due to the bus price rise) and the Passe Livre (after the demand for free public transport).

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 to: Before Saturdays opening match in Brasilia, crowds of demonstrators were dispersed by riot police.

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 to: Footage showed frightened Japanese supporters rushing from the area holding their children, as they heard the sound of shots  perhaps rubber bullets or tear gas.

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 to: Another protest march, near Rios Maracana Stadium, also had a heavy police response.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Menthol and other flavours will be banned from 2022, but, in a blow to the UK government, MEPs decided that most electronic cigarettes, increasingly popular as alternatives to tobacco products, need not be regulated in the same way as medicines.
 
 to: Menthol and other flavours will be banned from 2022, and MEPs also decided that most electronic cigarettes, which are increasingly popular as alternatives to tobacco products, do not need to be regulated in the same way as medicines.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: Health officials and the e-cigarette industry in Britain are seeking to clarify what this means  for instance, whether companies in the fast-expanding market face the same bans on sponsorship and promotion at sports events as tobacco firms.
 
 to: Health officials and the e-cigarette industry in Britain want to clarify what this means  for instance, whether e-cigarette companies will have the same bans on sponsorship and promotion at sports events as tobacco firms.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: But, in a statement, the DH said 
 to: But, in a statement, the DH said

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 to: However, we are disappointed with the decision not to regulate nicotine-containing products (NCPs), including e-cigarettes, as medicines.

simplify the text to Intermediate: 
 text: The UK e-cigarette industry, which broadly welcomed the parliaments vote, said it was already in talks with the Advertising Standards Authority, but added that it would not be sensible, proportionate, reasonable or useful to ban all advertising.
 
 to: The UK e-cigarette industry, which welcomed the parliaments vote, said it was already in talks with the Advertising Standards Authority but added that it would not be sensible, reasonable or useful to ban all advertising.

 to: They want to put the e-cigarettes, used by an estimated 1.3 million people in Britain, on the same legal basis as gums, patches and mouth sprays, which help smokers to quit, but the industry says that licensing is expensive and this would force alternatives to tobacco off the shelves.

 to: The MEPs voted to put health warnings on 65% of each cigarette pack.

 to: The UK government has delayed a decision on whether to follow Australia by introducing standardized packaging until there is evidence that this will reduce tobacco use.

simplify the text to Intermediate:

 to: Martin Callanan, the Conservative MEP for North East England, said
